TextBlock.Text: BETULA: With access to the planet's true surface, I noticed some interesting looking geysers located near the north pole.
ALNUS: Our teacher actually mentioned those. Apparently the tunnels lead all the way to the hollow core of this planet. She says that there's something down there that she wants us to see.
ADONSONIA: I've already tried jumping into one, but the flow of the water forced me back to the surface.
ALNUS: The geyser pressure is not terribly strong. Finding some way to limit the expansion of the water may be enough to stop the geysers from erupting properly.
ADONSONIA: Once we find a way to do that, we'll be free to go down the geysers and explore the core!
BETULA: That sounds quite dangerous! Did you sustain any injuries?
ADONSONIA: Not to worry, Betula, I... wait... OH NO! THE FLESH PARASITES FROM THE CORE! THEY'RE TAKING CONTROL!
BETULA: Good to hear that you're alright.
